short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore the Vedas, Indiaâ€™s ancient scriptures, with this extension. Find verses, translations and commentaries easily and quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed for the readers and devotees of the Vedas, the ancient scriptures of India. It allows you to easily navigate between the different cantos, chapters and verses of the Vedas, and access their translations and commentaries. Whether you want to study, meditate or chant the sacred texts, this extension will help you find the verses you need in a simple and convenient way.

The extension tested only these websites, www.holy-bhagavad-gita.org, or https://vedabase.io/

How to guide is here, https://scribehow.com/shared/How_to_Access_a_Specific_Text_Passage_on_VedaBase__duL1eMjxTV2JoaMfC2xfNw

Disclaimer: This extension is designed to work only with the websites www.holy-bhagavad-gita.org and https://vedabase.io/. The developer of this extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by these websites. The extension may not function properly or at all if used with other websites. The developer is not responsible for any errors, damages, or losses that may result from using this extension. Use this extension at your own risk.
